pages.text: The Combustive Enzyme causes the Maw to secrete a volatile compound. Upon the initial strike, the victim is coated in this primer, suffering the Combustive Effect.
A subsequent blow acts as the spark, instantly detonating the latent energy to deal massive additional damage increasing with each higher Stage.
Instability (Arsonist): The Maw struggles to contain its own heat. Occasionally, it may dribble unstable secretions onto its master, coating you in the Combustive Effect.
While tainted by this volatile primer, you become a living powder keg. Shun all contact with open fire, lest you ignite the catalyst and consume yourself in flame.
